title: A Drop in the bucket
creator_contributor_role: United States. Public Health Service, production company
subject_group: Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Water quality

Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Water fluoridation
description: Dramatised story of how dentists, civic leaders, health officials, and people of a town agreed to add fluoride to the community water supply. Explains how the fluoride is added, the cost of fluoridation, and the benefits accruing to the community.
